title: ISic003516. I.Sicily inscription 003516
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus) ((·))
Ofiliae ((·)) M(arci) ((·)) f(iliae)
Sabinae ((·)) M(arcus) ((·)) Sau-
feius ((·)) Sabinus ((·))p(osuit)
5fil(iae)((·)) piissimae ((·)) et
Ofiliae ((·)) Ursae ((·))
coniugi ((·)) et ((·)) sibi
libert(is) ((·)) libertab(usque)
post(erisque) ((·)) eorumomn(ium)

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon Bitto 2001 and photograph

English translation

To the shades of the underworld, for Ofilia Sabina, daughter of Marcus, Marcus Saufeius Sabinus set this up for his most pious daughter and for his wife, Ofilia Ursa and for himself and their freedmen, freedwomen and all their descendants

commentary

bibliography

  • 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
  • Orsi 1916 143 fig.16 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701
